title: Nomura Bank launches Libre with Polygon for on-chain tokenization of alternative assets
description:
Libre, the institutional Web3 infrastructure platform, has officially launched on-chain, enabling the tokenization of alternative assets following its successful cross-chain transaction on Polygon, according to a March 19 statement shared with CyptoSlate. Libre is a collaborative effort between WebN, a web3 incubator hub, and Japan-based investment bank Nomura’s digital asset subsidiary, Laser Digital. Earlier in the […]

The post Nomura Bank launches Libre with Polygon for on-chain tokenization of alternative assets appeared first on CryptoSlate.

title: Mastering Crypto Fundraising in 2024: Harnessing Crypto Payment Gateways to Conquer Challenges
description: In the ever-evolving realm of cryptocurrency, new projects emerge daily, each striving to carve a niche and secure funding to fuel their ambitions. However, the journey to fundraising success is fraught with hurdles, which, if not addressed, can impede progress and dampen investor interest.

title: Analysts See Gold Reaching $2,600 per Ounce Amid Strong Market Demand
description: While bitcoin experienced a 12% decrease following its all-time high last week, gold has shown relative stability over the past five days, with only a slight 1% decline in the same period. In a similar vein to crypto enthusiasts, advocates for gold predict that the metal will continue its upward trajectory, potentially reaching the $2,600 […]

title: Centrifuge Introduces New Platform for Streamlined On-Chain Fund Management
description: Centrifuge, a pioneering blockchain technology firm, has unveiled its latest innovation: an on-chain fund management platform designed to revolutionize the operation of credit funds on public blockchains. The groundbreaking platform aims to streamline fund management by consolidating a fund’s investment positions, transactions, and operational data, both on-chain and off-chain, into a secure and unified environment. […]

title: Libre Launches Tokenization Platform for Institutional Investors
description: Libre, a cutting-edge tokenization platform designed for the issuance and distribution of tokenized alternative assets, has officially launched for eligible investors. The platform, which leverages Polygon technology, aims to revolutionize the way institutional investors access and manage alternative investments.  Developed by WebN Group and Laser Digital, Libre has garnered attention with Brevan Howard and Hamilton […]

title: EU lawmakers pass legislation extending anti-money laundering controls to crypto
description: Two committees within the European Parliament have recently approved key components of a wide-ranging anti-money laundering legislative package that includes measures applicable to the cryptocurrency sector.  This legislative progress follows a January agreement on the Anti-Money Laundering Regulation (AMLR), which mandates that crypto service providers adhere to customer verification protocols and monitor transactions involving self-hosted […]

title: Grayscale Announces Fee Reduction for Bitcoin ETF Amidst $12 Billion Outflows
description: Grayscale, a leading digital asset management firm, has signaled a strategic shift in its fee structure for the Grayscale Bitcoin Trust ETF (GBTC), following a significant $12 billion in outflows.  Michael Sonnenshein, CEO of Grayscale, in a recent interview with CNBC, confirmed that the firm plans to reduce the fees for its flagship $26 billion […]

title: Empower Oversight Challenges SEC Over Cryptocurrency Documents
description: In a significant legal move, Empower Oversight has initiated a lawsuit against the Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC), accusing the agency of failing to adequately respond to a Freedom of Information Act (FOIA) request.  The request was centered around obtaining documents that could potentially reveal conflicts of interest within the SEC concerning cryptocurrency regulation. Empower […]

title: Bitcoin ‘Danger Zone’ Imminent As BTC Reaches Point of Market Cycle Historically Correlated With Correction: Analyst
description:
A widely followed crypto analyst is warning of an imminent Bitcoin (BTC) correction based on historical market cycles. Pseudonymous crypto trader Rekt Capital tells his 424,500 followers on the social media platform X that Bitcoin will enter the so-called “danger zone” today, when it might undergo a significant correction. The trader says that historically, Bitcoin […]

The post Bitcoin ‘Danger Zone’ Imminent As BTC Reaches Point of Market Cycle Historically Correlated With Correction: Analyst appeared first on The Daily Hodl.
